Manual tracking makes it difficult to identify inefficiencies or high energy equipment. This leads to higher costs, excess carbon emissions, and failure to meet sustainability goals.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The solution would use ServiceNow Asset Management, Performance Analytics, and Now Intelligence to collect, analyze, and visualize energy usage data in real time. IoT sensors installed on machinery send data to the platform, where dashboards highlight inefficiencies and trigger automated maintenance or optimization workflows through Flow Designer and Predictive Intelligence.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with IoT sensors, energy meters, and manufacturing control systems (via APIs or MQTT). Secure data storage and analytics services for real-time monitoring.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Integrating diverse sensor hardware and legacy systems.
  • Ensuring accurate, continuous data collection.
  • Managing large-scale data processing in real time.
  • Encouraging adoption and behavior change among facility teams.
